{"id":693547033,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1651737780,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"51 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/693547033/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Shortest Unsorted Continuous Subarray","memory":"27.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findUnsortedSubarray(vector<int>& nums) {\n        vector<int> snums(nums);\n        sort(snums.begin(), snums.end());\n        int start = nums.size();\n        int end = 0;\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++) {\n            if(nums[i] != snums[i]) {\n                start = min(start, i);\n                end = max(end, i);\n            }\n        }\n        if(start <= end) {\n            return end - start + 1;\n        }\n        return 0;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"shortest-unsorted-continuous-subarray","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
